title: 'perfect' gold ore

properties.name: description
properties.value: 'Perfect' gold ore is ore mined in the Witchaven dungeon, found south-east of Ardougne. It requires 40 Mining to mine and can be smelted into a 'perfect' gold bar.

'perfect' gold ore
Released9 April 2002 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemFamily Crest
Properties

EquipableNo
StackableNo
DestroyDrop
ExamineThis needs refining.

Value150 coins
High alch90 coins

Weight2.267 kg
Advanced data
Item ID446

'Perfect' gold ore is ore mined in the Witchaven dungeon, found south-east of Ardougne. It requires 40 Mining to mine and can be smelted into a 'perfect' gold bar.

'Perfect' gold ore is the same as regular gold ore. The differences are only seen by Avan from Family Crest quest. He will say that he'll give you his piece of the crest if you make him a necklace and ring made from a 'perfect gold bar' with rubies in them.

Smelting 'perfect' gold ore while wearing the Goldsmith gauntlets received after the quest will result in the standard double experience (56.2 exp with the gauntlets, rather than 22.5 from smelting it normally).

'Perfect' gold bars can be used as a substitute for regular gold bars when making other jewellery, but it will function as if regular gold was used, and it will not receive the prefix 'perfect'.

If the player is wearing Varrock armour 2 or higher while mining 'perfect' gold ore, and the additional ore mining perk activates, the player will receive normal gold ore.

If the player is wearing Varrock armour 1, the player can receive an additional 'perfect' gold ore although the ore is above coal in terms of exp given.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The P in 'perfect' gold ore is not capitalised because all items in Old School RuneScape use ucfirst capitalisation, wherein the first character of a string is capitalised, but the rest is not. In this case, the first character is the quotation mark (').

He will say that he'll give you his [[crest part|piece of the crest]] if you make him a necklace and ring made from a 'perfect gold bar' with [[Ruby|rubies]] in them. Smelting 'perfect' gold ore while wearing the [[Goldsmith gauntlets]] received after the quest will result in the standard double [[experience]] (56.2 exp with the gauntlets, rather than 22.5 from smelting it normally). 'Perfect' gold bars can be used as a substitute for regular gold bars when making other jewellery, but it will function as if regular gold was used, and it will not receive the prefix 'perfect'. If the player is wearing [[Varrock armour 2]] or higher while mining 'perfect' gold ore, and the additional ore mining perk activates, the player will receive normal [[gold ore]].
